headline: Walgreens to pay $300 million in US opioid settlement
summary: Walgreens will also owe the U.S. an additional $50 million if the company is sold, merged, or transferred prior to fiscal year 2032, the Justice Department said.  "We strongly disagree with the government’s legal theory and admit no liability," Walgreens spokesperson Fraser Engerman said in a statement.

raw.headline: Walgreens to pay $300 million in US opioid settlement
raw.summary: Walgreens will also owe the U.S. an additional $50 million if the company is sold, merged, or transferred prior to fiscal year 2032, the Justice Department said.  "We strongly disagree with the government’s legal theory and admit no liability," Walgreens spokesperson Fraser Engerman said in a statement.
